name: Adventure Dimension
description:
Do you like adventure?  Do you like strategy?  Do you love casual style  games?

Adventure Dimension!

Do you ignore suggestions to drink or inject bleach?

Adventure Dimension!

Do you love dogs or cats or birds or horses or pigs?

Adventure Dimension!

Independently wealthy and love to make it rain?

Adventure Dimension!

-----------------------------

Adventure Dimension is a game.  It's got all the elements of a game:

  • A kick-ass title screen
  • Scrolling text
  • 8-bit-ish techno-pumping music loop and lo-fi chillax music
  • life or death drama in another dimension
  • a kick-ass end screen
  • It also has an animal companion! 

What's not to love.

A play through can take as little as a minute.  How long can you last?  How many actions can you make?  How much treasure can you retrieve before you are zapped back to the mysterious wizards of dark magick who sent you away in the first place?

Written entirely in Python.  So, that's something. 

Suggestions and feedback welcomed  :)
